item.description:
GREAT RAFFLE & AUCTION PRIZES! Soup served @ 5:30pm

6:00pm Garden Walk & Mamapreneur Intro
7:00pm Belly Dance Class & Demo
7:30pm Hula Hoop Demo
8:00pm Drumming Circle

Wednesdays are Women's Nights @ the co-op...a sacred time for women to gather, relax and let their creative juices flow - just for a few hours every week.

Let the MOON MAGIC and MANIFESTATION begin this evening as we kick off The Red Tent Resurrection @ Alchemy and The Growing Green Co-op 6:30-8:30pm! Every Wednesday is dedicated to woman’s empowerment and self discovery in a supportive community that honors the Divine Feminine. Come dance, drum, clarify your intentions, build connections and just let go! If you are a visionary, healer, teacher, mother, artist, dreamer and have something to share - we invite you to join us. If you come to us simply to be in the company of other women, re-focus or be inspired - we invite you to join us. All women, of all ages, in any life cycle or transition are welcome.

Join us on this special evening for a free introductory highlight our upcoming woman’s programs: The 12 week Mom-preneur Support Group, Belly Dancing with Danita, Dance La Vie with Mylene, African Drumming with Cassie & Hula Hooping with Christy and special face readings! Tap into the most powerful and sacred aspect of yourself! For women of all ages.
item.name: Calling All Mamalutionaries - an open house!
